item.title: How To: This Website
item.description:
I have been searching long for an easy to make, easy to maintain website. Most things sucked until I found out about rmarkdown webpages. After a while it got boring building them. I discovered Hugo, which seems to be the perfect solution for me.

Getting Started

Hugo, GitHub pages, …

Manage Content

Start your webpage with

$ hugo server

Add content, change content and reiterate. If you are happy with everything, deploy it to github using

$ ./deploy.sh "Commit message"
